Detailed Description

Class for testing that CHP files are the same +/- some epsilon. Also checks to make sure that at least some of the headers are the same (times/dates/versions change so not checked).

Definition at line 52 of file ChpCheck.h.

Check to make sure that two files are the same +/- some epsilon.

Parameters:

Definition at line 129 of file ChpCheck.h.

Referenced by ChpCheck().

bool ChpCheck::tagValuePairMostlySame ( TagValuePairTypeList &  gold,
TagValuePairTypeList &  test,
std::string &  msg 
) [inline, private]

Check the gold tag value pairs to make sure they are getting the same values in the test. We only check items that are in gold, which means that if a new field has been added it will not be checked.

Parameters:
gold - List of key, value pairs in the gold set.
test - List of key, value pairs in the set to be checked.
msg - Place for adding error messages as they are encountered.
Returns:
- true if same, false otherwise.
